data.text:
+ opportunities by being disrespectful. 

Honestly, we all should get off our high horse, because as the author aptly said "their peers aren't K-Pop anymore". If we want to break it for our boys, we should step back and evaluate our actions.

+ language in the US.
- They Need US Promotions. Interviews, guestings, TV shows, everything they can get to market them to the GP.
- More interaction with radio stations.
- Most important point: ARMYs, or in this case, the trolls and the rude ones who attack possible marketing +
